parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Animations </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> When used on a person,a smooth transition to the given move will be initiated, but all previous playMove are discarded. <br>
The difference between [[playMove]] and [[playMoveNow]] is that [[playMove]] adds another move to the move queue, while [[playMoveNow]] replaces the whole move queue with new move (see [[#Examples|Example 2]]).
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> see [[:Category:Moves]] for respective games animations.</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> soldier [[playMoveNow]] moveName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> soldier: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> moveName: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[playMoveNow]] "AmovPercMevaSlowWrflDf"</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[switchMove]] "AmovPercMstpSrasWrflDnon"; 
[] [[spawn]] 
{
	[[sleep]] 0.5; 
	[[player]] [[playMove]] "AmovPpneMstpSrasWrflDnon"; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>player goes prone</value></part></template>
	[[player]] [[playMove]] "amovPknlMstpSrasWrflDnon"; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>player gets up on one knee</value></part></template>
};</code>
<code>[[player]] [[switchMove]] "amovpercmstpsraswrfldnon";
[] [[spawn]]
{
	[[sleep]] 0.5; 
	[[player]] [[playMove]] "AmovPpneMstpSrasWrflDnon"; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>player never goes prone</value></part></template>
	[[player]] [[playMoveNow]] "AmovPknlMstpSrasWrflDnon"; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>player goes down on one knee straight away</value></part></template>
};</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>  [[playMove]], [[switchMove]], [[playAction]], [[playActionNow]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
